text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
…Oh, they're here! 
We've been waiting, Light O-chan, Durandal-chan! 
And——

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh… 
Um… Kuu-chan. I…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
——Dantsu-chan, the pizza!! 
We got a whole bunch, right?

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, yea! 
So this is Pokke-chan's recommendation——

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Extra large pizzas, so big that her whole freestyle race team was totally stuffed, and we've got a ton of them too!

text_block_list.name: HIshi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…You heard her. 
If it's just the four of us eating all this pizza, it's not gonna end well.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…So, you'll help us, right? 
Like you did before? Kei-chan.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
Mmm, this pizza's so cheesy and delicious～♪ 
And the other food we ordered came in all at once… 
Haha, talk about an extravagant meal!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: I am honestly stunned. There's so much pizza and potato chips and kebabs and soda and for dessert we have ice cream.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: I can feel my brain juice leaking out of my ears just looking at this. Total calorie nuke. Who gives a crap about seafood dinners anyway. All glory to salt oil and sugar.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Miracle-san, would you like a drink? 
I would be happy to get one for you. 
Will something fizzy-wizzy do?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: F-fizzy-wizzy?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
——Pff. Hahaha. Yeah, of course. 
Then… could I please have cola? Thank you, Durandal.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu and Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Ah! …Eek. Woooaahhhhh～!! 
Hut! Hut! Haaaaaaaa!!!!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
Gosh, you beat me so fast…! 
That's already three wins for Durandal-chan… You're really tough～!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Heh… My sacred sword is sharp even in virtual form. 
That is to say, you didn't stand a chance.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: Oh my goodness Durandal's ego is getting so big it's going to break straight through the ceiling. Someone has to stop her.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: All right Kei-chan it's your turn now. You're a good girl and do your best to help everyone. That means you're going to take revenge for us. Do I have that right? Yes I do.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Are… are you sure? Uh, I'll give it a shot, but——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
That's our Kei-chan! C'mon, go for it! 
If you win our team gets a hundred million… No, THREE hundred million points!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Does that not sound the slightest bit unfair to you!? 
…Tch, I will not falter! The noble knight Durandal shall not be felled by you Twin Miracles!!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: Are you ready the category is "Things that are straight lines"!! One, two, a musical staff!!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: One, two, a ruler!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: BZZT!! Sorry but there are these ridiculous looking things called French curve rulers. You should have been more specific and said a set triangle or a straightedge! Next! One, two!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? 
Uh. A g-guard rail!!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: BZZT!! Don't you know about the little curve they put on the end of them to absorb impacts. You absolute fool. Guard rails would be so elegant if not for that! Next! One, two!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh… 
S-sorry, you're going too fast——

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
BZZT!! Unbelievable. What am I going to do with you people. 
If this keeps up we won't even make it a full round before I——

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: ——A4 PAPER!!

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
Heh. It is far too early for you to let your guard down. 
As soon as this game began, I already knew the category you'd choose!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
…I see. Durandal. Very well. 
I've always known this day was fated to come. En garde!!

text_block_list.name: The two
text_block_list.text:
A brick! Tatami! A laser beam! Axes on a graph! 
A utility pole! A one way sign! An incline ahead sign!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Durandal-chan sure knows a lot of things that are straight lines… Must be because of how she's always with Light O-chan!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Yeah, but… Uh, isn't this gonna go on forever?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: ——Ahaha, jeez!! Okay, okay, let's just call it Light O-chan's win! All right, all right, next game——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(…Wait, huh? 
Kei-chan said she was gonna use the restroom, but she's still not back——)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…Gotta use the bathroom for a sec! 
Be right back.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Uhh… Mm? 
——Oh. 
………There you are～

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Kuu-chan…? 
Why are you——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I could ask you the same thing. 
…Why are you all the way out here, Kei-chan?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…I just… …I wanted to listen from over here. 
Everyone… sounds so happy. Like they're having so much fun. 
So I——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Then come back and join us. 
If it sounds so happy and fun… 
…Why won't you let yourself join in?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…I… 
…I… 
…——Sorry.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's because I've always… I… 
I'm always, always… only making things worse for everyone.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I can't get up by myself, I can't move, I can't eat… 
I just keep causing problems… 
Over and over and over… That's why I——

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I can't keep doing this. 
…I hate it.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: …I can't help but… hate myself.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…Ngh. ………Nghh…… 
Rgh……………………

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Sorry. I don't know how you really feel, Kei-chan. 
I'm just… plain old me. 
…I won't ever really understand what you're going through.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: So… I'm going to say something only someone who doesn't get it could say. Well… I'll probably keep saying dumb stuff like this. Probably.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
——But you know, you being there… Singing, going on this little vacation… It was so much fun… 
And it made me really happy.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
So even if you do hate yourself a little, Kei-chan… 
For what it's worth… 
I really liked being with someone as loving as you.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…Okay, Kei-chan. It's about time to go. 
We've got to get changed, after all.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's time for our little vacation's closing act～! 
——Let's so sing. Together.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Whoa, it's pitch black…! We'd better light those candles quick. Wow, and listen to that echo…

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
How splendid! This will make for a fine performance. 
Now, then… Are we all prepared?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
Of course we are. 
——Isn't that right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: …Kei-chan～.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…Yeah, Kuu-chan. 
Let's sing. …All of us, together.
